reviews.text: Was a nice place near Firestone, the food was good. Cookies were nice and soft. Watch prices, can add up quickly.

Hidden GEM. hiding in plain sight. On Broad Street. Delicious lunch, great service, AND???? COOKIES. COOOKIES. rainbow, thumbprints, macaroons, wrinkles, and, and, and... Lots of plants, homey atmosphere, did I say? Great food. Fan. Right here. You might want to be, too.
Honestly- very delicious. Grandma style “old world” cookies that remind you of holidays and baked with love. 100% recommend.

Charged my mother,  76 year old woman $12 for a bread mayo lettuce and tomato sandwich!! When I called to asked about this issue  I was laughed at and brushed off. What a lack of compassion!! They may have good food my mother only ate bread....and who wants to do business with people who pray on the elderly!! Masters' customers beware!!
Steeped in history and oh so good. The bicentennial is unmatched.
Pleasantly surprised by the organised and quick process of changing an ID card. Visited at mid-day.
No,i don t like it,the only thing what its nice its the building
Five stars for the beautiful historical building only - the authorities don't deserve that much. At least they nicely restored the building, though.
Nice building with a very good mayor. Emil Boc will remain in Cluj-Napoca history because the entire city had become at a very good overall rate.
great looking historical building

it was a good place to go for having a big meal with reasonable price. 
The dish is  pretty big so you can share 2 dishes with 3 female friends. 
The restaurant is located near the main train station. It took 5 min on foot for me.
Average restaurant with a good variety of food and in addition a separate daily menu. Portions are quite big, so you will not leave hungry. Prices are okay.

The worse customer service we have ever experienced in any place. Did not feel welcome at all, feel sorry that i even entered in the first place, and obviously did not stay. Luckily there are other nice restaurants near by. Absolutely terrible.

A WONDERFUL SERVICE ! INTERNATIONAL MENU IN FRENCH ENGLISH AND ITLAIAN MANY CHOICE TOO, VERY GOOD PRICE ! NEAR THE CENTER OF LUXEMBOURG WHEN THE WEATHER IS NICE YOUCAN EAT OUTSIDE MANY PLACES IF YOU COME WITH A GROUP OF PERSON 
IT WAS A GREAT SOUVENIR I WENT 2 TIMES  !

Never have I ever experienced such racism and rudeness until tonight at dinner at this restaurant in Luxembourg.

After finding out that the restaurant we enjoyed during our last trip was closed for the summer (Chez Rafael is a great choice!), we decided to simply dine at an outdoor restaurant across the street, not realizing how rudely I will be treated in about 10 minutes’ time, not only as a paying customer, but as a human being.

I grew up in the U.S. as an Asian American but I never experienced such racial profiling, simple ignorance, rudeness, and aggression from anybody. The restaurant owner told us to move tables from the initial table where we were seated because it was “reserved for drinks only,” but a few minutes later, other white Europeans sat there and enjoyed their meal right at that table. We waited about 15 minutes until we can finally get the restaurant owner to come over to take our order. Before we were even finished with ordering (while we were still looking at the menu and pointing at the item to ask what this local Luxembourg dish is), he decided to just walk away. Several times during the meal, we were sure they heard us, but they all simply ignored us and didn’t even look our way. My other colleague was joining later after her conference call, so we asked for another menu and an extra plate, the owner of the restaurant glared at us and shouted, “why you want another menu? For what?” I was astonished at the type of racism that I faced this evening. I lost all of my appetite and had to leave early because I just couldn’t stand this mistreatment as a paying customer.

I really hope that this is not a representation of racism against Asians in Luxembourg. I am baffled at what I went through this evening.

Great place for group, dates, solo hangout. The food was great. The drinks was great. Great selection of drinks. Prices can range from Rm10-300. Take your pic. Very enjoyable place. The band tonight was awesome! The singers was lit! Very recommend to go for a night out.

Took a while until I got a menu, staff was walking past me a lot and looking at me but not doing anything, made me feel a bit weird coming there alone. Once I was able to order it was all good. The pizza was awesome!
What can i say except this place is perfect & the service is excellent. Came here countless of times. Now let's talk about the food...yes the food...they are superb!!! 😊 worth every cent
nothing much, just good vibes good songs and etc ....

5 stars for the food, 0 star for the service. The food was extremely good and the ambience is just perfect for any occasion. We came here for my mum’s birthday celebration. However, your stuffs’ attitude was terribly bad, one of the stuffs showed unwillingness and impatience when we asked her to take photos for us. That spoiled the whole dining experience tonight. As a restaurant with reputations, you should have trained your stuffs better. We customers pay for the food as well as the service that you provide, if your stuff is unwilling to serve the customers with an open heart, then she should stay out from the service line. What’s worser than horrible food? Horrible service. I would love to come back again for the food, but you don’t deserve a second chance if your stuff’s attitude remains the same.

My friend recommended this restaurant, and I just visited. 

But, I did not expect the  flavor of cilantro overwhelmingly. Honestly, it was too much for the first time visitor. 

After that, the chef told me, if you notice me that requests the lack of cilantro before the order the regular menu then I could give the less cilantro salsa, and others. 

And he gave me one bag of the chips. 

I am sure that recommend this restaurant for Mexican food, but if you are the first time visitor, you should tell them that they down the level of cilantro or other spices.
Amazing tacos their salsa was amazing. If you get spicy..  they mean it so be careful if you're not used to it!

I work in Kensington and this is one of two places I'll eat at weekly. The burrito is a wicked value. Chicken, beef or pork burrito always are good. Super nice staff. Possibly the best Mexican food in Calgary.
Excellent service, excellent food! The prices were great. Check this place out!

I was muy impressed, awesome service, Great food, awesome portion, Wow, Wow, Wow. This small Restaurant has very big character, I have given only 5 stars here but if I could give more I would. They deserve more that is how good the Food and Customer Service is. Very Well Done Bodega, very well done.
